titleStmt.title: To the supreme authority of England, the High Court of Parliament assembled at Westminster the humble petition of Richard Truelove and Henry Truelove, of the town of Ipswich, on the behalfs [sic] of themselves and others, heirs at law to Thomas Causton, late of Thundersley in the county of Essex, Gent. A martyr
titleStmt.author: Truelove, Richard.
Truelove, Henry.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
